languages.text: Надменный ксенос Злоба поможет Лорд-капитану, если т{mf|от|а} починит испортившийся конвектор, из-за которого ящероподобный нелюдь страдает от холода. Как бы ни было возмутительно данное предложение, это — реальный шанс на спасение.

An arrogant lizard-like xenos named Malice is suffering because of the cold. He might help the Lord Captain if {mf|he|she} fixes the broken heat convector. Preposterous as it may sound, this may be a real chance to obtain some aid and survive.
languages.original_text: Надменный ксенос Злоба поможет Лорд-капитану, если т{mf|от|а} починит испортившийся конвектор, из-за которого ящероподобный нелюдь страдает от холода. Как бы ни было возмутительно данное предложение, это — реальный шанс на спасение.

traits.locale_text: An arrogant lizardlike xenos named Malice is suffering because of the cold. He might help the Lord Captain if {mf|he|she} fixes the broken heat convector. Preposterous as it may sound, this might be a real chance to get some aid and survive.

An arrogant lizard-like xenos named Malice is suffering because of the cold. He might help the Lord Captain if {mf|he|she} fixes the broken heat convector. Preposterous as it may sound, this may be a real chance to obtain some aid and survive.

An arrogant lizard-like xenos named Malice is suffering because of the cold. He might help the Lord Captain if {mf|he|she} fixes the broken heat convector. Preposterous as it may sound, this may be a real chance to obtain some aid and survive.

languages.text: Malice, un xénos arrogant à l'apparence de lézard, souffre du froid et pourrait accepter d'aider {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} si {mf|celui-ci|celle-ci} répare le convecteur de chaleur. Aussi ridicule que cela puisse paraître, c'est peut-être l'occasion d'obtenir l'aide nécessaire pour survivre.
languages.original_text: An arrogant lizard-like xenos named Malice is suffering because of the cold. He might help the Lord Captain if {mf|he|she} fixes the broken heat convector. Preposterous as it may sound, this may be a real chance to obtain some aid and survive.

traits.locale_text: Malice, un xénos arrogant à l'apparence de lézard, souffre du froid et pourrait accepter d'aider {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} si {mf|celui-ci|celle-ci} répare le convecteur de chaleur. Aussi ridicule que cela puisse paraître, c'est peut-être l'occasion d'obtenir l'aide nécessaire pour survivre.

languages.text: 一个名叫“恶棍”的蛇人异形因为巢穴太冷而大为光火。这个傲慢的异形告诉行商浪人，说只要{mf|他|她}能修好损坏的热对流器，或许就能得到他的协助。虽然这听起来很荒谬，但或许这是眼下最好的机会帮助行商浪人存活下来，获得援助。
languages.original_text: An arrogant lizard-like xenos named Malice is suffering because of the cold. He might help the Lord Captain if {mf|he|she} fixes the broken heat convector. Preposterous as it may sound, this may be a real chance to obtain some aid and survive.

traits.locale_text: 一个名叫“恶棍”的蛇人异形因为巢穴太冷而大为光火。这个傲慢的异形告诉行商浪人，说只要{mf|他|她}能修好损坏的热对流器，或许就能得到他的协助。虽然这听起来很荒谬，但或许这是眼下最好的机会帮助行商浪人存活下来，获得援助。

languages.text: マリスという名の傲慢なトカゲに似た異種族が寒さに喘いでいる。ロード・キャプテンが壊れた熱風温度調整器を直せば、その見返りとしてこちらを助けてくれるかもしれない。荒唐無稽に思うかもしれないが、これが援助を受け、生存するための本当のチャンスかもしれない。
languages.original_text: An arrogant lizard-like xenos named Malice is suffering because of the cold. He might help the Lord Captain if {mf|he|she} fixes the broken heat convector. Preposterous as it may sound, this may be a real chance to obtain some aid and survive.

traits.locale_text: マリスという名の傲慢なトカゲに似た異種族が寒さに喘いでいる。ロード・キャプテンが壊れた熱風温度調整器を直せば、その見返りとしてこちらを助けてくれるかもしれない。荒唐無稽に思うかもしれないが、これが援助を受け、生存するための本当のチャンスかもしれない。

languages.text: Ein arroganter, echsenartiger Xenos namens Tücke leidet unter der Kälte. Vielleicht hilft er dem Lord Captain, wenn dieser den kaputten Hitzekonvektor repariert. So hanebüchen es auch klingen mag, das könnte eine echte Chance sein, Hilfe zu bekommen und zu überleben.
languages.original_text: An arrogant lizard-like xenos named Malice is suffering because of the cold. He might help the Lord Captain if {mf|he|she} fixes the broken heat convector. Preposterous as it may sound, this may be a real chance to obtain some aid and survive.

traits.locale_text: Ein arroganter, echsenartiger Xenos namens Tücke leidet unter der Kälte. Vielleicht hilft er dem Lord Captain, wenn dieser den kaputten Hitzekonvektor repariert. So hanebüchen es auch klingen mag, das könnte eine echte Chance sein, Hilfe zu bekommen und zu überleben.

languages.text: Un xenos arrogante con aspecto de lagarto sufre a causa del frío. Podría ayudar a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán si le arregla el convector térmico. Por absurdo que parezca, podría ser de ayuda para sobrevivir.
languages.original_text: An arrogant lizard-like xenos named Malice is suffering because of the cold. He might help the Lord Captain if {mf|he|she} fixes the broken heat convector. Preposterous as it may sound, this may be a real chance to obtain some aid and survive.

traits.locale_text: Un xenos arrogante con aspecto de lagarto sufre a causa del frío. Podría ayudar a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán si le arregla el convector térmico. Por absurdo que parezca, podría ser de ayuda para sobrevivir.

languages.text: Melanet adındaki kertenkeleye benzeyen, küstah zeno; soğuk yüzünden acı çekiyor. Lord Kaptan bozuk ısı bağlayıcısını tamir ederse ona yardımcı olabileceğini söylüyor. Kulağa saçma gelse de yardım alıp hayatta kalmayı sağlayabilir.
languages.original_text: An arrogant lizard-like xenos named Malice is suffering because of the cold. He might help the Lord Captain if {mf|he|she} fixes the broken heat convector. Preposterous as it may sound, this may be a real chance to obtain some aid and survive.
